<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An analysis to compute the \\c PointerTypes for pointers in a \\c Module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Since this analysis is only run during codegen and the new pass manager</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// doesn&#39;t support codegen passes, this is wrtten as a function in a namespace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is very simple to transform it into a proper analysis pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This code relies on typed pointers existing as LLVM types, but could be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// migrated to a custom Type if PointerType loses typed support.</span></CodeLine>
